issue.title: {C++} BitArray tests failures on big-endian platforms
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8755](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8755). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These two test causes failures as attached
```java

[  FAILED  ] BitArray.TestBool
[  FAILED  ] BitArray.TestValues
```
```java

 [----------] 3 tests from BitArray
[ RUN      ] BitArray.TestBool
/home/ishizaki/Arrow/arrow-rle/cpp/src/arrow/util/rle_encoding_test.cc:52: Failure
Expected equality of these values:
  buffer[0]
    Which is: '\0'
  0xAA
    Which is: 170
```
